brands.title: Great Brands at Mexe
brands.honda_story: Honda Genuine Parts provides genuine parts and components for Honda vehicles, ensuring quality and optimal durability.
brands.toyota_story: Toyota Genuine Parts offers high-quality replacement parts, ensuring stable and safe operation for Toyota vehicles on every journey.
brands.hyundai_story: Hyundai Mobis is a supplier of genuine components and parts for Hyundai vehicles, known for advanced technology and high durability.
brands.ford_story: Ford Genuine Parts provides genuine replacement parts for Ford vehicles, ensuring confidence and optimal performance for customers.

videos.title: Our YouTube Channel
videos.description: Mexe is the leading platform for car trading and information. Post car listings quickly and easily. We provide the latest news on car brand promotions, showrooms, and car reviews.

brands.page_description: Explore the world's most prestigious and quality automotive brands. Learn about their history, featured products, and unique characteristics of each brand.
brands.try_different_search: Try a different search term or clear filters
brands.cta_description: Contact us for consultation on automotive accessories that match your vehicle brand.
brands.honda_description: Honda is Japan's leading automotive and motorcycle brand, renowned for high reliability, fuel efficiency, and advanced technology. From compact cars to versatile SUVs, Honda always delivers smart mobility solutions.
brands.toyota_description: Toyota is the world's largest automaker, pioneering hybrid technology and famous for superior quality. With over 80 years of experience, Toyota has established its position through durable and safe vehicles.
brands.hyundai_description: Hyundai is South Korea's leading automotive brand, distinguished by modern design, advanced technology, and superior value. Hyundai is leading the electric vehicle trend and sustainable mobility solutions.
